name: Plague: Unstable
description:
A game made for the Ludum Dare 49.

Play as the last remaining scientist who knows how to make a cure for a plague ravaging your world causing mass instability. You must traverse a dangerous dungeon in order to get the last remaining ingredient so you can save the world!

Controls:
WASD to move.

Mouse to aim.

Left Mouse to shoot.

Shift to dodge.

E to use potions.

ESC to quit the game.

Credits:

Jonothan Sigmon: Programming and some art

Emery Freeman (AKA Parallax_Eclipse): Art and Sound Effects

Music is from a humble bundle a friend got a few years ago for us to use in our games.
